body:
pg.8 how was it? the dinner.. was it good? - im sorry. what are you saying? - the shabu shabu is delicious - yes the shabu shabu is delicious - the sake is good as well - yes the sake is good..
idk might be wrong..

quick - rough translation.. might be wrong..
pg. 3 *avoid kiss.. - hahaha - nande yo(why?) - iya.. sono.. its embarassing.. (or something like that) - kiss dake desho.. hora.. (its just a kiss right?) just a bit! - then a kiss (maybe)
pg. 5 this is not just a kiss - even with a light kiss i will get an erection - its already hard all the way to the inn (i know.. my english sucks) - datte.. what i wanted is a kiss
pg.17 ohayou- ohayo gozaimasu - lets do it once more in the bath - you already put it in, aren't you - datte.. its standing you know.. (yep read the woman part with classic flirty milf sound)
So this is how sex when drunk looks like.
You would think this whole story takes place in a washing machine.
